changelogversion.changelogtext: Fix lollipop notification and lockscreen artwork
Add support for Commandr skip/prev/pause voice commands
Fix sortby menu item
Added settings to configure footer click actions
New now playing screen
Option to show visualizer on now playing screen instead of artwork
Improve memory usage on low ram devices
Bug fixes
Massive rewrite (so big I skipped a version)
More materialization (Material Design)
Performance improvements.
Much better folder browser. Dual storage phones can now browse primary and secondary storage (experimental and requires Kitkat+). Folders is now a plugin that can be disabled if not needed.
New artwork fetching backend. NOTE: If your circles are ovals or cropped weird, clear the artwork cache, the new fetcher will clip images appropriately.
Old Holo themes have been thrown out. Added new themes with Material Design colors, and a new theme picker
Note: Most dreams won't work with "Alternate dream" on Lollipop
Address some crashes
Update tablet layout
Add sleep timer
Improve list scrolling performance
Add now playing panel back to profiles
New plugin api for network libraries. Upnp and Drive plugins published.
Updated UI with some Material Design elements
Folder browsing
Setting to restrict Party Shuffle to specific folder
Orpheus is now free / donation supported
Fix crash on pre kitkat devices
ICS fixes
Fix services running all the time
Orpheus now shows in Simple Last.fm Scrobbler enabled apps list
Add daydream (for 4.2+). Shows album art and controls during playback. Option to pick any installed dream to show while music is pause or stopped.
Settings now follow app theme
Add ability to choose and re-order home pages
Add playing indicator to queue
Add Muzei extension (shows album art as wallpaper)
Add support for ICS (4.0+)
Widgets now open app when artwork is clicked
Fix scrobbling with the app Simple Last.fm Scrobbler
Fix playlist cards having wrong menus
Fix a memory leak
Bug fixes
Share intent from now playing menu now sends album art
Brand new widgets with 4 sizes to choose from.
Brand new artwork backend. [b]NOTE:[/b] All existing artwork will be redownloaded and old caches cleared
New setting to delete image cache
New setting to prefer downloading album art over art from device
New setting to specify image cache size (larger cache recommended for better performance)
Added some animation to now playing panel
Genres profile now shows albums and songs
Bug fixes (reported crashes / casting)
Tablet (landscape) layout
Add dark themes
Fix casting ogg (vorbis) media
Add album and artist info to casting
Address a couple crashes.
Initial release.
